title: $1B Crypto Liquidated After Iran Strikes
summary: US airstrikes on Iranian uranium facilities triggered over $1B in crypto liquidations within 24 hours, wiping out 172,000 traders. Ethereum led losses with $296M liquidated, while Bitcoin saw $152M, with most forced closures on Bybit and Binance as the total crypto market cap dropped 4.4% to $3.25T.

title: Kraken Launches Native BTC Yield via Babylon
summary: Kraken launched Bitcoin 'staking' using Babylon's time-lock protocol, offering up to 1% APR without wrapping or bridging. The service keeps BTC on its native blockchain while securing PoS chains, paying rewards in BABY tokens with a 7-day unbonding period.

title: ETH ETFs See Largest Outflow in a Month
summary: Spot Ethereum ETFs recorded over $11M in outflows on Friday, the highest since mid-May, led by a $19.7M exit from BlackRock's ETHA fund as ETH dropped below $2,400. Despite the dip, ETH ETFs maintained $840M in net monthly inflows while Bitcoin ETFs continued their 9-day inflow streak.

title: Nakamoto and KindlyMD Boost BTC Treasury to $763M
summary: Nakamoto and KindlyMD raised an additional $51.5M in PIPE funding, increasing their planned bitcoin treasury to $763M pending merger approval. The firms aim to convert all funds into BTC with 7,316 BTC already escrowed, joining 228 companies now holding corporate bitcoin treasuries.

title: Trezor Issues Phishing Alert After Support Abuse
summary: Trezor issued a phishing alert after attackers abused their support contact system to target users. The hardware wallet manufacturer warned users about fraudulent communications attempting to steal credentials and funds.

title: Cointelegraph Website Hacked with Fake Airdrop Scam
summary: Cointelegraph faced front-end exploits with attackers promoting fraudulent airdrops on their website. The security breach exposed visitors to phishing attempts through fake token distribution campaigns.

title: Self Chain CEO Ousted Over $50M OTC Fraud Allegations
summary: Self Chain removed their CEO following allegations of involvement in a $50M cryptocurrency OTC fraud scheme. The governance action highlights ongoing risks in peer-to-peer crypto trading and executive misconduct in the blockchain space.

title: Texas Signs Strategic Bitcoin Reserve Bill Into Law
summary: Texas Governor Greg Abbott signed a strategic Bitcoin reserve bill into law, making Texas the third US state to create official BTC reserves. The legislation signals growing state-level adoption of cryptocurrency as a treasury asset.

title: Coinbase Secures EU-Wide MiCA License
summary: Coinbase obtained EU-wide crypto services approval under MiCA regulations, allowing comprehensive operations across European markets. The license positions Coinbase as a compliant operator in one of the world's largest regulatory frameworks.
